methods.name: OsrHelper
methods.logic: Constructor for the OsrHelper class, likely initializes member variables based on the provided OptimizedCompilationInfo.

methods.name: SetupFrame
methods.logic: Prepares the given Frame object for On-Stack Replacement (OSR).  This likely involves setting up the frame layout and initializing registers/stack slots.

methods.name: UnoptimizedFrameSlots
methods.logic: Returns the number of stack slots allocated in the unoptimized frame that are needed for the OSR process.

methods.name: FirstStackSlotIndex
methods.logic: Calculates the index of the first stack slot in the frame.  The calculation considers that TurboFan environments do not contain the context and includes the receiver and parameters.
